description: Creates dials requests for the specified campaign Amazon Connect account. This API is idempotent.

parameters.name: dialRequests
parameters.description: A list of dial requests. (dict) --- A dial request for a campaign. Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request. The phone number of the customer, in E.164 format. Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone A custom key-value pair using an attribute map. The attributes are standard Amazon Connect attributes, and can be accessed in contact flows just like any other contact attributes. (string) --- The key of the attribute. Attribute keys can include only alphanumeric, dash, and underscore characters. (string) --- The value of the attribute.

nested_params.name: clientToken
nested_params.description: Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request.

nested_params.name: phoneNumber
nested_params.description: The phone number of the customer, in E.164 format.

nested_params.name: expirationTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.

nested_params.name: attributes
nested_params.description: A custom key-value pair using an attribute map. The attributes are standard Amazon Connect attributes, and can be accessed in contact flows just like any other contact attributes.

nested_items.name: successfulRequests
nested_items.description: A list of successful requests identified by the unique client token.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: A predefined code indicating the error that caused the failure.
